channel.title: Virtuous [14 Bosses] [10+ Training Areas] [20+ Skills] [Music System]
channel.description:
[center]Hello,
Welcome to Virtuous. A brand new Runescape Private Server, with features like no other and one providing players with one of the best gaming experiences ever. We are obviously currently in beta as stated in the title, so we would love it if players could come give the server a go, and please leave feedback and suggestions. A website will be coming soon for the server, so stay tuned.
Website: [url=http://virtuous-rsps.forumotion.com/]http://virtuous-rsps.forumotion.com/[/url] Download Client: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/g1vgatv6v952f8q/virtuous.jar]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/g1vgatv6v952f8q/virtuous.jar[/url]
Brief list of features: > 80% Summoning > Polypore Staff > Killstreak System > Custom Free For All Minigame > Custom Dungeons > Duel Arena > Custom Items > Clipped NPC/Players > Majority 634 Items > Overloads & More![/center]
[center] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/fznr9.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XWEjzd3.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MgrGvgZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/C9uKFLc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dDFcdg2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CaChRCJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QZO2I6c.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5QBpVlC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/brY1jx8.png[/img][/center]

item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[center]Hello,

Welcome to Virtuous. A brand new Runescape Private Server, with features like no other and one providing players with one of the best gaming experiences ever. We are obviously currently in beta as stated in the title, so we would love it if players could come give the server a go, and please leave feedback and suggestions. A website will be coming soon for the server, so stay tuned.

Website: http://virtuous-rsps.forumotion.com/
Download Client: https://dl.dropbox.com/s/g1vgatv6v952f8q/virtuous.jar

Brief list of features:

80% Summoning
Polypore Staff
Killstreak System
Custom Free For All Minigame
Custom Dungeons
Duel Arena
Custom Items
Clipped NPC/Players
Majority 634 Items
Overloads & More![/center]
